citations.narrative:
The silver metal edges of the entryway roof for the shelter for the 7 goats and 2 sheep is damaged on both sides
leaving bent metal and sharp edges. This roof edge needs to be repaired to prevent potential injury.
To be corrected by 7-22-16.
Exit briefing conducted with licensee.
